amendment.description: An amendment numbered 119 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce the salary of Douglas L. Parker, Assistant Secretary of Labor for Occupational Safety and Health, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 270, 1 Present (Roll no. 672).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 270, 1 Present (Roll no. 672).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
